description:
It`s finally time to attempt the 1/100 control that Eiichiro once drew in his notes. However, it`s incredibly difficult to pull off 1/100 control and Eiichiro`s shots keep missing. Eiichiro believes that this is the only way he can win as he recalls Coach Miura saying that if he returns all shows with excellent control, the theory is that he will never lose.
Source: crunchyroll
